name: Little Cactus General Store
description:
Just another day at the Little Cactus General Store!

----

Use ARROWS or WASD to move. SPACEBAR or movement to continue.

Made in Bitsy Color+ a fork of  Bitsy (V 7.2). Utilizing Bitsy Savior. 

Utilizing Pixsy by ruin (Bitsy HD version)

Transparent sprites hack by Sean 

Bitsymuse hack by David Mowatt.

Music and Sound Effects by Dustin van Wyk

Writing by Sky Hope

Design + Art by Oliver Hope
